example.parse: (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-2 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قطع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحوار)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رئيس) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجمهورية)))))) (S (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يبقي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-OBJ-4 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC البلاد)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4)) (PP-PRD (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مأزق) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المواجهة)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (TYPO السطة) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المعارضة))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: in a state of confrontation between the government and the opposition
